mapper.select: SELECT co.comment_id, co.post_id, co.user_id, u.nick_name AS nick_name, u.user_head AS user_head, co.comment_content, co.parent_comment_id, co.created_at, co.status_for_user, co.status_for_compliance FROM comments co LEFT JOIN user u ON co.user_id = u.id WHERE co.post_id = #{postId} ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT co.comment_id, co.post_id, co.user_id, u.nick_name AS nick_name, u.user_head AS user_head, co.comment_content, co.parent_comment_id, co.created_at, co.status_for_user, co.status_for_compliance, COUNT(reply.parent_comment_id) AS reply_count FROM comments co LEFT JOIN user u ON co.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN comments reply ON co.comment_id = reply.parent_comment_id WHERE co.post_id = #{postId} GROUP BY co.comment_id ORDER BY reply_count DESC
